extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the official Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia application for the Android.Listen to weekly teachings on Bible passages or topics that interest you. The app also includes Pastor Joe's teachings both topical and verse by verse through the entire bible. Share it with your friends via Twitter, or email!For more information about Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia please visit: http://www.ccphilly.org/More About CCPhilly: Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia began in November, 1981. Pastor Joe Focht started the Bible study with 20 people. God has abundantly blessed the teaching of His Word as this small Bible study group multiplied into hundreds, and then into thousands.Today, some 8,000 adults attend Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia with over 4,000 children enrolled in our Sunday School ministry. In the same way that Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia was born out of Calvary Chapel of Costa Mesa, we have also been blessed to witness the birth of an additional 20 Calvary Chapel Fellowships throughout the Delaware Valley area.The Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia App was created with The Church App by Subsplash.App: Â© 2011 The Church App, Content: Â© 2011 Calvary Chapel of Philadelphia. All rights reserved.Keywords: Jesus, God, Bible, Christ, Church App, Church, Calvary, Chapel, Joe, Focht, Philadelphia, CCPhilly

reviews.title: If u cant get to the word, The word gets to you!
reviews.comment: I Love it, unlike some one who wouldnt know an episle from an aposle even with his speaking digital mickey mouse watch on. But then again who am I but a sinner saved by grace!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best advice a man can get,
reviews.comment: Staying in the word of God is the key, Pastor Joe is blessed with the ability to translate the message without distorting the original message. Never want it to end, captivating,pure and honest. Im glad I found Calvary\'s Pastor Joe. Amen
reviews.author: Joe Corner

reviews.title: Excellent excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Travis Moore

reviews.title: Needs to force people to get saved.
reviews.comment: I was disappointed that my loved ones who listened still had free choice. Also this app needs a clock function that predicts the day and the hour if the Rapture.  Other than that it is a decent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: I am a recent member of this church and was delighted to find this app. Downloaded for Samsung galaxy note 10.1.  You Go Calvary Chapel!  God bless you pastor Joe for all of your hard work and dedication to the Lord\'s work.  I use this app as an adjunct to my Bible studies as nothing can replace the joy and peace I get via fellowship and worship at the chapel.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app. Works wonderfully. And i get to take Pastor Joe wherever I go.
reviews.author: Erica Walker

reviews.comment: Video link crashes. Anyone else have this problem? HTC EVO 4g

reviews.title: Keeps freezing
reviews.comment: I love this app when it works.  But it always freezes up. It freezes my tablet completly.

reviews.title: CC Philly
reviews.comment: Outstanding in every respect. Verse by Verse Verse is my favorite, my wife and I are going through it a sermon a day.

reviews.comment: This study is quite specific, funny, and informative. I have learned so very much from Pastor Fosht\'s informative teaching!!!

reviews.title: A great bible study resource
reviews.comment: Pastor Joe teaches the entire bible  over a period of about 10 years. This app makes his entire collection  available as well as current teachings.
